title: YOUTHSAVE Act
content: Job Corps Youth Sentencing Alternative for Vocational Education and Training Act - Amends the Job Training Partnership Act to establish a separate Youthsave program, under the Job Corps program, to provide education and job training services to eligible youths convicted of non-violent criminal offenses. Authorizes the Secretary of Labor to make agreements with specified entities to establish and operate up to ten Youthsave centers. Authorizes appropriations.
